snippet: SCHALLER--Ralph F.,died peacefully in his sleep on the morning of January 10, 2016, next to his adored and adoring wife, Roni Schaller, who remained by his side throughout his illness. His friends and family cannot imagine life without him. A memorial to celebrate his life will take place on Sunday, January 17, at 1:30pm, at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue. As Ralph told all who asked, "I had a great life, better than most." 1/3
